tha-ap82:5.4: padmapupphāni → tīṇi pupphāni (bj, pts1) | padumapupphāni (s2, s3)
tha-ap82:22.3: Tepi padmā → te visuddhā (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
tha-ap82:24.4: nibbānaṃ → nibbāṇaṃ (bj), pāpuṇissati → phassayissati (bj) | passayissati (pts1, mr)
tha-ap82:25.4: anubhosiṃ tisampadā → anubhosiṃ tisampadaṃ (bj) | anubhosin ti sampadā (pts1) | anubhūyanti sampadā (mr)
